name: SmartRecruiters
description: Add a SmartRecruiters Instance to connect your existing SmartRecruiters account to the Human Capital Hub, allowing you to manage all of your Human Capital activities across multiple ERP Elements. You will need your SmartRecruiters  account information to add an instance.

configuration.name: Allow Select Fields parameter
configuration.description: Enables use of global fields query parameter to filter response to only specified fields. This will override any existing vendor functionality on the connector

configuration.name: OAuth Scope
configuration.defaultValue: candidates_read candidates_create candidates_offers_read candidates_manage candidate_status_read configuration_read configuration_manage jobs_read jobs_manage jobs_publications_manage users_read users_manage messages_write messages_manage analytics_read company_read audit_events_read reporting_read

configuration.name: Authentication Type
configuration.description: Authentication using  API Key select 'custom' and for Oauth2 select 'oauth2'

configuration.name: Default select fields
configuration.description: Generic map used to specify default fields for bulk download and GET /all requests. Each key should be the canonical objectName and values may be specified as a comma-delimited string or a list of strings

configuration.name: Time of Getting Token or Performing Authentication
configuration.description: SmartRecruiters  Time of Getting Token or Performing Authentication

configuration.name: Event poller refresh interval
configuration.description: SmartRecruiters  Set time interval for polling application (in minutes)

configuration.name: Event Notification Signature Key
configuration.description: A key used to generate a validation hash of the event notification webhook callback payload

resources.description: Search for candidates

parameters.name: where
parameters.description: The CEQL search expression.Only AND operator is supported. The only search fields are q,jobId,location,averageRating, status,subStatus, tag,updatedAfter, onboardingStatus, propertyId and propertyValueId.The propertyId and propertyValueId need to give together.An example would be jobId='71910345-c03a-4384-b72e-cf357ebafdbf'

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: The page number. Defaults to 1 if not provided

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page size. Defaults to 200 if not provided. Maximum of 2000
